emails.subject: RE: plateform missing items in dashboard menu/  urgent
emails.body_text:
Thank you to all of you for your quick help. 

I start now to find back my way ! 

 

Best regards / Meilleures salutations,

Michel Nicaise

Phone: +41 (0) 58 531 29 57

 

From: Jebrane Ben Salem <jebrane.bensalem@dnext.io> 
Sent: 18 September 2025 13:12
To: Michel Nicaise <michel.nicaise@ameropa.com>; Support Dnext <support@dnext.io>
Cc: Pablo Figueroa <pablo.figueroa@dnext.io>
Subject: Re: plateform missing items in dashboard menu/ urgent

 

	You don't often get email from jebrane.bensalem@dnext.io <mailto:jebrane.bensalem@dnext.io> . Learn why this is important <https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification>  

	

 

	External email warning: Please exercise caution when clicking links or opening attachments. 

 

Hello Michel,

Sorry for the inconvenience and thank you for flagging this. The missing crops, inspections, and menu items are due to recent updates and reorganizations we made on the platform (Like GG said)

Here are the main changes:

*	Economics → GnO Economics

*	Supply and Demand → SND

*	G&O SND → BF SND

*	Crop → GnO Crop

	*	

*	In Economics dashboards, we added COP Farmers (replacing Cost of Production), as well as FOB & CNF and Industrial Margin groups.

	*	

*	Inspections can now be found under Lineups → Europe Inspections -TAXUD.

	*	

We made these adjustments to improve organization and clarity. Please let us know if you need any guidance navigating the new structure.

I sent you a team's message already.

Thank you for your understanding. 

Mohamed Jebrane Ben Salem

Head of Data Analysis Team

                                                                                                   jebrane.bensalem@dnext.io <mailto:jebrane.bensalem@dnext.io>  

+216 29 715 739



 

 

DNEXT INTELLIGENCE SA | Avenue Louis-Casaï 81 | CH-1216 Cointrin

    info@dnext.io <mailto:info@dnext.io>  | Tel. +41 22 732 53 72 | www.dnext.io <http://www.dnext.io/> 

 

 

________________________________

From: Michel Nicaise <michel.nicaise@ameropa.com <mailto:michel.nicaise@ameropa.com> >
Sent: 18 September 2025 09:53
To: Support Dnext <support@dnext.io <mailto:support@dnext.io> >
Cc: Pablo Figueroa <pablo.figueroa@dnext.io <mailto:pablo.figueroa@dnext.io> >
Subject: plateform missing items in dashboard menu/ urgent

 

Hello support,

it seems several issues in the plateform; no more crops no more EU inspections….
menu missing…

please check asap.

thank you



 

 



Michel Nicaise
Senior Analyst, Grains & Oilseeds
 
Ameropa AG
Avenue de Rumine 13, 1005 Lausanne
Switzerland
+41 58 5312957  +41 79 5666613 
michel.nicaise@ameropa.com <mailto:michel.nicaise@ameropa.com>  
www.ameropa.com <http://www.ameropa.com/>

Thank you to all of you for your quick help.

Michel Nicaise

From: Jebrane Ben Salem <jebrane.bensalem@dnext.io>
Sent: 18 September 2025 13:12
To: Michel Nicaise <michel.nicaise@ameropa.com>; Support Dnext <support@dnext.io>
Cc: Pablo Figueroa <pablo.figueroa@dnext.io>
Subject: Re: plateform missing items in dashboard menu/ urgent

 

You don't often get email from jebrane.bensalem@dnext.io. Learn why this is important

 

External email warning: Please exercise caution when clicking links or opening attachments.

 

Hello Michel,

Sorry for the inconvenience and thank you for flagging this. The missing crops, inspections, and menu items are due to recent updates and reorganizations we made on the platform (Like GG said)

Here are the main changes:

  • Economics → GnO Economics
  • Supply and Demand → SND
  • G&O SND → BF SND
  • Crop → GnO Crop
  • In Economics dashboards, we added COP Farmers (replacing Cost of Production), as well as FOB & CNF and Industrial Margin groups.
  • Inspections can now be found under Lineups → Europe Inspections -TAXUD.

We made these adjustments to improve organization and clarity. Please let us know if you need any guidance navigating the new structure.

I sent you a team's message already.

Thank you for your understanding. 

Mohamed Jebrane Ben Salem

Head of Data Analysis Team

                                                                                                   jebrane.bensalem@dnext.io 

+216 29 715 739

 

 

DNEXT INTELLIGENCE SA | Avenue Louis-Casaï 81 | CH-1216 Cointrin

    info@dnext.io | Tel. +41 22 732 53 72 | www.dnext.io

Sorry for the inconvenience and thank you for flagging this. The missing crops, inspections, and menu items are due to recent updates and reorganizations we made on the platform (Like GG said)
Here are the main changes:

We made these adjustments to improve organization and clarity. Please let us know if you need any guidance navigating the new structure.

emails.subject: RE: plateform missing items in dashboard menu/  urgent
emails.body_text:
Michel,

 

We are reorganizing with Black Fryers (EU part). Sorry for inconvenience. It should be better but we should have communicated before hand. What dashboard are you look at in particular? We will direct you to them.

 

Saber, 

Please call Michel urgently and provide support.

 

Thnak you

Guillaume
